titles.title: A bill to include home delivery of children's publications in the existing rates for children's publications sent to schools.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Postal Operations and Services.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, US Postal Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/8/1987--Introduced. Extends the reduced postage rates currently in effect for classroom publications to the home delivery of children's educational publications which contain no paid advertising.
